NK041(di)008:1: // rten gsum rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga dge legs 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK041(di)008:3: rten gsum rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga dge legs 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba /
NK041(di)008:4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:5: kun khyab 'gyur med bde chen rdo rje sems //
NK041(di)008:6: srid zhi'i 'khor lor zhi dang khro gar gyis //
NK041(di)008:7: rnam rol bsam mi khyab pas bsod nams dang //
NK041(di)008:8: ye shes mchog stsol dpal ldan bla mar 'dud //
NK041(di)008:9: gdod ma'i ye shes dngos kun khyab gnas pa //
NK041(di)008:10: sad byed bde gshegs snang brnyan ye shes kyi //
NK041(di)008:11: phyag rgyas byin rlobs rab gnas cho ga'i khrigs //
NK041(di)008:12: dge legs 'dod pa 'jo ba'i char du 'bebs //
NK041(di)008:14: shes par bya ba'i gzhi bshad pa dang /
NK041(di)008:15: bshad pa'i cho ga lag tu blang ba'i rim pa'o //
NK041(di)008:25: slob dpon chen pos bde 'dus rab gnas su /
NK041(di)008:26: bya dgos mi dgos gnyis su bstan //
NK041(di)008:28: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gdod ma nas rang
NK041(di)008:29: bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK041(di)008:30: yon tan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid nam
NK041(di)008:31: mkha' ltar kun khyab tu bzhugs pa'i gnas lugs rtogs
NK041(di)008:32: pa shes rab can gyi dbang du byas na /
NK041(di)008:34: chos nyid stong pa'i don rtogs na //
NK041(di)008:35: gang zhig gang gis gang du brlag /
NK041(di)008:36: gdod nas ma skyes skye med la //
NK041(di)008:38: chos rnams 'od gsal skye med du //
NK041(di)008:39: rtogs par ldan pas mchod gnas rnams //
NK041(di)008:40: rab tu gnas pa mi dgos so //
NK041(di)008:42: yang sku gzugs kyi rten sogs de bzhin gshegs pa
NK041(di)008:43: rnams kyi thugs rje'i rnam rol sku gsung thugs kyi
NK041(di)008:44: phyag rgyar sprul pa'o snyam pa'i dad pa can gyi
NK041(di)008:45: dbang du byas na yang snga ma las /
NK041(di)008:46: yang na stong nyid ma rtogs kyang //
NK041(di)008:47: sku gzugs glegs bam mchod rten sogs //
NK041(di)008:48: sangs rgyas rnam sprul byin rlabs las //
NK041(di)008:49: byung ste min na mi 'byung bar //
NK041(di)008:50: rtogs te shin tu dad ldan na //
NK041(di)008:51: rab tu gnas pa mi dgos so //
NK041(di)008:53: de lta bu'i don gnyis po khong du ma chud
NK041(di)008:54: pa'i gdul bya thun mong pa rnams tshogs gnyis kyi
NK041(di)008:55: gnas la 'god pa'i ched du rab gnas kyi cho
NK041(di)008:56: ga dgos par bstan pa ni /
NK041(di)008:57: 'jig rten tha snyad la gnas te //
NK041(di)008:58: kun rdzob don du bstan pa yin //
NK041(di)008:59: zhes drang nges kyi dbye bas gsungs pa bzhin rab gnas kyi rtog pa las kyang /
NK041(di)008:60: sangs rgyas kun na rab tu bzhugs /
NK041(di)008:61: rab tu gnas pa gang yang med //
NK041(di)008:62: 'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas //
NK041(di)008:63: rab tu gnas pa rab tu btags //
NK041(di)008:65: ngo bo ni rten gang la sangs rgyas kyi che
NK041(di)008:66: ba'i yon tan rnams bsdus nas dge zhing bkra shis
NK041(di)008:67: pa'i don can du byed pa yin te /
NK041(di)008:68: khro gnyer can gyi rtog pa las /
NK041(di)008:69: rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bzhengs nas ni //
NK041(di)008:70: gus pas rgyal ba ltar mchod bya //
NK041(di)008:71: thub pas de ltar gzigs nas ni //
NK041(di)008:72: yid can rnams la skyob par mdzad //
NK041(di)008:75: sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la //
NK041(di)008:76: ye shes gzhugs pa'i byin rlabs can //
NK041(di)008:78: sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid yin //
NK041(di)008:81: su pra tish+tha bi d+hi zhes pa'i sgra las bzang por bsgrub pa dang /
NK041(di)008:82: yun ring du gnas par byed pa'i cho ga ste /
NK041(di)008:83: rten ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid du bsgrub pas bzang po dang /
NK041(di)008:84: 'khor ba ji srid du gnas par byed pas yun ring ba'o //
NK041(di)008:85: de gnyis kyang ye shes pa dgug gzhug dang brtan
NK041(di)008:86: bzhugs dang 'brel ba'i phyir rab gnas kyi cho ga
NK041(di)008:90: sh+tha gnas pa ste rten so so'i bdag nyid du gnas pa la yang bgrang du rung ngo //
NK041(di)008:92: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la //
NK041(di)008:93: mtha' yas grol ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
NK041(di)008:94: rgyal ba dgug dang gzhug par bya //
NK041(di)008:96: gnyis pa gang la gnas bya'i rten ni /
NK041(di)008:100: 'bur du byas pa la sogs kyis mtshon nas /
NK041(di)008:101: gzugs sku'ii rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi khro'i snang brnyan dang /
NK041(di)008:102: gsung gi rten rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa rnams kyi gsung rab glegs bam /
NK041(di)008:103: thugs rten ni chos sku'i rten spyi ming bye brag
NK041(di)008:104: tu btags pa mchod rten brgyad la sogs pa rnams
NK041(di)008:105: dang / gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang /
NK041(di)008:106: rgyan dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ji snyed pa rnams so //
NK041(di)008:107: de dag kyang dbyibs blang rgyan la sogs pa so
NK041(di)008:108: so'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par tshad la phebs par
NK041(di)008:110: sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste //
NK041(di)008:111: zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan //
NK041(di)008:112: tshad kyi tshad la pheb cing bzang //
NK041(di)008:113: de 'dra rab tu gnas par bya //
NK041(di)008:115: gsum pa gnas pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK041(di)008:116: skyon yon gyi cha las gnyis te /
NK041(di)008:118: rten de yang rab gnas ma byas pa dang /
NK041(di)008:119: cho ga dman pas byas na'ang mi shis pa dang bsod nams kyi zhing du mi 'gyur te /
NK041(di)008:120: gang du sku gzugs rab rdzogs pa //
NK041(di)008:121: byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na //
NK041(di)008:122: de la bkra mi shis pa 'byung //
NK041(di)008:123: de srid mchod par de mi 'os //
NK041(di)008:125: cho ga dman pas mi bya ste //
NK041(di)008:126: rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis //
NK041(di)008:131: sngar bshad pa'i skyon rnams mi 'byung ba dang /
NK041(di)008:132: rten de nyid mchod pa las bsod nams 'phel zhing
NK041(di)008:133: rgyud byin gyis rlob pa sogs don chen por 'gyur
NK041(di)008:134: ba yin te / de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
NK041(di)008:135: dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya //
NK041(di)008:136: cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yis //
NK041(di)008:137: brtags pa las byung tshul legs pas //
NK041(di)008:138: de byas bsod nams che ba ni //
NK041(di)008:139: mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye //
NK041(di)008:140: sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nya da kyis //
NK041(di)008:143: pad+ma dbang chen gyi rgyud las /
NK041(di)008:144: sku gsung thugs rten khyad par phyir //
NK041(di)008:145: rab gnas bzang po'i cho ga bya //
NK041(di)008:147: bzhi pa gnas byed kyi slob dpon ni /
NK041(di)008:148: theg pa gsum gyi bslab pas rgyud sbyangs shing /
NK041(di)008:149: khyad par rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang
NK041(di)008:150: gis smin cing dam tshig dag pa phyi nang gi
NK041(di)008:151: de nyid bcu sogs slob dpon gyi las rab 'byams
NK041(di)008:153: rab gnas kyi cho ga la mthong brgyud phyin chad
NK041(di)008:154: kyis mkhas pas don mthun du lag tu longs pa
NK041(di)008:155: ste / slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing //
NK041(di)008:156: mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan //
NK041(di)008:157: phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes //
NK041(di)008:158: las rnams kun la mkhas pa'o //
NK041(di)008:162: stangs stabs gdan dang bzlas brjod dang //
NK041(di)008:163: sbyin sreg mchod pa las la sbyar //
NK041(di)008:164: slar bsdu ba yi rnam pa ni //
NK041(di)008:165: phyi yi de nyid du bcu yin no //
NK041(di)008:167: phyir bzlog gnyis kyi cho ga dang //
NK041(di)008:168: gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang //
NK041(di)008:169: kha sbyor dbye ba'i cho ga dang //
NK041(di)008:170: gtor ma rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang //
NK041(di)008:171: drag shul sgrub pa'i cho ga dang //
NK041(di)008:172: rab tu gnas dang dkyil 'khor sgrub //
NK041(di)008:173: gsang ba'i de nyid bcu yin no //
NK041(di)008:175: dge slong dge tshul khyim na gnas pa rnams rim bzhin rab 'bring tha mar byas pas so //
NK041(di)008:176: lnga pa gang du bya ba'i gnas ni /
NK041(di)008:177: phyogs dang kha dog la sogs pa'i sgo nas zhi rgyas kyi gnas su basngagasa pa dang /
NK041(di)008:178: khyad par bkra shis shing nyams dga' ba'i gnas te /
NK041(di)008:179: yang thog mchod rten la sogs dang //
NK041(di)008:180: khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su //
NK041(di)008:181: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni //
NK041(di)008:182: cho ga dag dang ldan par bya //
NK041(di)008:185: bkra shis dag pa chen po'i gnas //
NK041(di)008:186: yid 'ong nyams ni rnam par dga' //
NK041(di)008:187: zhes sogs kyis mtshon te dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnams las bshad pa bzhin no //
NK041(di)008:188: drug pa gang gi tshe bya ba'i dus ni /
NK041(di)008:189: zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang //
NK041(di)008:190: rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin dang //
NK041(di)008:191: tshes grangs bdun gyi bdag nyid la //
NK041(di)008:192: rgyal bas rab gnas la sogs basngagasa //
NK041(di)008:193: zhes pa ltar dgun zla tha chung nas dbyar zla
NK041(di)008:194: 'bring po'i bar nyi ma byang bgrod kyi dkar phyogs
NK041(di)008:195: gza' skar 'phrod sbyor bzang zhing bkra shis pa la
NK041(di)008:197: tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam //
NK041(di)008:198: shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la //
NK041(di)008:199: byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pas //
NK041(di)008:200: gsang mchog dngos grub myur ba'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:201: gza' skar shis pa blang bar bya //
NK041(di)008:202: zhes pas rig byed kyi gzhung gzhan las kyang shes par bya ba nyid de /
NK041(di)008:204: rig byed dag gi yan lag las //
NK041(di)008:205: dus rnams shes par bya ba ni //
NK041(di)008:206: bkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang //
NK041(di)008:207: 'byor dang dus tshes bzang ba ni //
NK041(di)008:208: mtshan ma'i rtog pa yin mod kyang //
NK041(di)008:209: brtags na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung //
NK041(di)008:212: dkyil 'khor dang ni rab gnas pa //
NK041(di)008:213: yar gyi ngo la brtag par bya //
NK041(di)008:214: zhes pa'ang gtso che ba'i dbang du dgongs kyi //
NK041(di)008:216: gza' dang skar ma 'dzom gyur na //
NK041(di)008:217: mar gyi ngo la'ang nyes pa med //
NK041(di)008:219: bdun pa gang zhig bya ba'i cho ga ni /
NK041(di)008:220: rten 'brel rab gnas su grags pa dang /
NK041(di)008:222: sangs rgyas sras bcas dad pas spyan drangs nas rten la bzhugs su gsol te /
NK041(di)008:223: phyag mchod dang shis brjod byed pa mdo lugs su grags pa dang /
NK041(di)008:224: gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde tha dad nas gsungs pa rnams dang /
NK041(di)008:225: khyad par rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud mdo sgyu dang
NK041(di)008:226: sgrub sde rnams su gsungs pa'i don pan grub shing
NK041(di)008:227: rta chen por grub pa rnams kyis ji ltar bkral
NK041(di)008:228: ba bzhin snying por dril ba'i cho ga rnam par
NK041(di)008:229: dag pa nyid kyis bya dgos te /
NK041(di)008:230: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni //
NK041(di)008:231: cho ga dag dang ldan par bya //
NK041(di)008:232: cho ga dman pas mi bya ste //
NK041(di)008:234: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
NK041(di)008:235: dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya //
NK041(di)008:238: dkyil 'khor la sogs gang byas kyang //
NK041(di)008:239: rab gnas ye shes mi ldan na //
NK041(di)008:240: tshogs dang bri ba'i nus pa med //
NK041(di)008:243: sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas //
NK041(di)008:244: rnam grol rim par thob 'gyur na //
NK041(di)008:245: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pas //
NK041(di)008:246: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK041(di)008:247: zhes sogs gsungs pa nyid kyang spyir shes par bya ba yin no //
NK041(di)008:248: gnyis pa ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga bshad pa la /
NK041(di)008:250: rab gnas kyi cho ga dngos so //
NK041(di)008:251: dang po bsnyen pa la mtshan ma dang dus dang grangs tshun chad rab 'bring tha mar byas te /
NK041(di)008:252: ci rigs pa sngon du song ba gzhir byas nas /
NK041(di)008:253: khyad par rab gnas kyi don du gzhan gyis gsol ba btab pa'am /
NK041(di)008:254: rang nyid kyis sgrub pa gang yin yang de nyid
NK041(di)008:255: kyi ched du bsnyen pa gso ba la 'jug par
NK041(di)008:256: bya ste / slob dpon chen pos /
NK041(di)008:257: lan gsum gzhan gyis gsol btab pas /
NK041(di)008:259: bsnyen pa rnam gnyis mthar phyin pas //
NK041(di)008:261: gnyis pa rab gnas dngos kyi cho ga la /
NK041(di)008:267: rjes kyi bya ba dang gsum las /
NK041(di)008:268: dang po sbyor ba'i sdoms ni /
NK041(di)008:269: dkyil 'khor las rim yo byad bshams //
NK041(di)008:270: sgrub mchod bum bzlas sbyangs bkru phyi //
NK041(di)008:271: rten bskyed spyan drangs mchod dgug gzhug /
NK041(di)008:272: rgyas gdab dbang bskur mchod bstod sngags //
NK041(di)008:273: gtor ma snyan gsan mchod bstod dang //
NK041(di)008:274: bzod gshegs rten dgab lhag gnas sdoms //
NK041(di)008:276: dang po dkyil 'khor gyi las rim ni /
NK041(di)008:278: ras bris sogs phyi dkyil gang rigs la brten pa'i dbang du byas pa las /
NK041(di)008:279: rdul tshon ltar na sa chog lhag gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang /
NK041(di)008:280: ras bris la brten na yang lha sta gon sogs sngon 'gros ras bris bkram /
NK041(di)008:281: bum dgod rgyan dgram pa rnams sgrub dkyil so so'i
NK041(di)008:282: rtsis 'gos bsdus pa bzhin shes par bya ba yin
NK041(di)008:283: te / sa yi cho ga gzhung bzhin bya //
NK041(di)008:284: de rjes lha dang bum pa dang //
NK041(di)008:285: sbyin sreg sa yi lha mo dang //
NK041(di)008:286: slob ma dang ni yon bdag rnams //
NK041(di)008:287: gzhung bzhin sta gon rdzogs byas te //
NK041(di)008:289: gnyis pa khyad par rab gnas kyi yo byad ni /
NK041(di)008:290: gnas khang rgyan gyi khyad par du mas mdzes par byas pa'i gzhi der /
NK041(di)008:292: shar du khrus stegs gru bzhi khru do sogs ji ltar rigs pa brtsegs pa'am /
NK041(di)008:293: de dang mnyam pa'i gzhi ba byung lngas byug /
NK041(di)008:294: re kh+aa dkar po gru bzhi pa'i nang du sna
NK041(di)008:295: tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rigs lnga yum bzhi'i
NK041(di)008:296: mtshan ma dang bcas bris pa'i dbus su many+dzi la
NK041(di)008:297: khrus gzhong me long dang bcas pa bzhag /
NK041(di)008:298: 'dab ma brgyad la khrus bum kha rgyan mgul chings
NK041(di)008:299: dang bcas pa brgyad thun mong du dri'i chus sum
NK041(di)008:300: gnyis bkang / khyad par shar bum nas brtsams te rim bzhin dri lnga /
NK041(di)008:307: rin chen lnga rnams so sor blug pa'am /
NK041(di)008:308: dbye ba med par rdzas nyer lnga kho nas kyang chog /
NK041(di)008:309: bum pa brgyad med na lnga'am gcig gis kyang rung /
NK041(di)008:310: 'dag rdzas kyang 'khar ba la sogs pa'i snod du
NK041(di)008:311: shing shun lnga sogs bum pa dang grangs mtshungs pa'am
NK041(di)008:315: skyu ru ra dang yung ba'i phye ma ste bzhir byas pa'am /
NK041(di)008:316: de dag las gang 'byor shu ti dang nye shing
NK041(di)008:317: sogs sbyar ba'i khrus chal gcig tu bsdus kyang rung
NK041(di)008:318: / sku mnye'i til mar dri ldan /
NK041(di)008:320: sran dkar gyi phye ma rnams snod gcig tu bkod pa /
NK041(di)008:321: so sor durba'i pir dang bcas pa /
NK041(di)008:322: de nyid kyi mtha' mchod pas bskor zhing /
NK041(di)008:324: phyogs gcig tu rin po che'i gzhong pa me tog
NK041(di)008:325: gis bkang ba'i dbus su gzungs bum dri'i chus bkang
NK041(di)008:326: ba'i khar gser dngul lta bu'i me long la tsan+dana
NK041(di)008:327: dkar po gur gum gi wam rnams 'o ma dang
NK041(di)008:328: sbyar nas rten 'brel snying po tshar bdun bris pa
NK041(di)008:330: kha tshar ma nyams pa'i khrus ras dri bzang gis sa bon lnga bris pa /
NK041(di)008:333: g.yas su mnga' dbul gyi man+dala ri gling gi bkod
NK041(di)008:334: pa'i dbus su zho dang mar bur gyis sbags pa'i
NK041(di)008:335: dpal bshos sha chang ma 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang
NK041(di)008:338: gzhan yang spyi sgos kyi mchod pa dang /
NK041(di)008:340: dbang po bsal byed kyi thur ma /
NK041(di)008:342: rol mo'i khyad par sogs 'og tu dgos pa'i yo
NK041(di)008:343: byad mtha' dag ma tshang ba med par 'du bya'o
NK041(di)008:344: // gsum pa dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod ni /
NK041(di)008:345: bdag mdun 'jug pa gcig pa rnams ni thun mong du sgrub /
NK041(di)008:346: tha dad pa rnams ni bdag bskyed sngon du btang nas mdun bskyed sgrub cing /
NK041(di)008:347: bdag nyid 'jug pa dbang chog bzhin byed na gzungs
NK041(di)008:348: bum dang gtso las kyi bum sgrub skabs 'dir byas
NK041(di)008:349: nas dbang len / rig pa'i me tog dor ba
NK041(di)008:350: tsam la brten nas bum sgrub bzhi ka dkyus gcig
NK041(di)008:351: nas dbang len / tu sbrel lo // bzhi pa bum pa sgrub pa ni /
NK041(di)008:352: thog mar gzungs bum bsang sbyang /
NK041(di)008:353: stong pa'i ngang las rin po che'i bum pa mtshan
NK041(di)008:354: nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'i steng du zla ba la
NK041(di)008:355: gnas pa'i rten 'brel snying po'i sngags phreng 'od zer
NK041(di)008:356: gyi phung por 'bar bas 'khor 'das kyi bdud rtsi
NK041(di)008:357: thams cad bsdus nas 'od du zhu ba bum chu
NK041(di)008:358: dang ro gcig tu 'dres par bsam shing sngags tshan
NK041(di)008:359: re re yang brgya rtsa re bzla bar bshad kyang
NK041(di)008:360: spyir bargya'am / de yang dka' na tshar bdun gyis
NK041(di)008:361: nyung mtha' byas pa re bzlas nas dung zhal gyi
NK041(di)008:362: chus me long gi yi ge rnams gzungs bum du
NK041(di)008:363: sbyangs pa las gtso las khrus bum thams cad la
NK041(di)008:365: 'di ni rab gnas kyi bum sgrub thams cad kyi
NK041(di)008:366: sngon du 'gro dgos par galpo las gsungs pa bzhin
NK041(di)008:367: no // de nas khrus bum rnams bsang sbyangs /
NK041(di)008:368: stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la
NK041(di)008:369: b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i bum pa yangs shing rgya
NK041(di)008:375: lha'i gos kyis mgul bcings pa /
NK041(di)008:376: dpag bsam shing gi kha rgyan can /
NK041(di)008:377: nang dri ma sbyong ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'i lha'i
NK041(di)008:378: chu bos yongs su gang bar bsam zhing gzungs thag
NK041(di)008:379: la brten nas / bum pa dang por /
NK041(di)008:380: gan+d+he s+n+aa na p+au dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ya sh+r+ai h+aum /
NK041(di)008:389: brgyad par ma ni sogs bye brag pa bdun re dang /
NK041(di)008:391: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka te sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h+aum /
NK041(di)008:393: ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tish+tha sid+d+hi lo tsa na sarba ar+tha swa d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:394: zhes spyan ma'i sngags nyer gcig tsam dang brtan par
NK041(di)008:395: bya ba'i ched du rdor sems kyi yig brgya dang
NK041(di)008:396: / las thogs med 'grub pa'i don du rten 'brel snying po'ang cung zad re bzla /
NK041(di)008:397: bum rdzas bye brag pa med na spyi sngags rnams kyis chog /
NK041(di)008:398: yungs thun dang gu gul la las sngags dang h+aum bzhi pa'ang bazla'o //
NK041(di)008:399: lnga pa sbyang ba la gsum gyi /
NK041(di)008:400: dang po bgegs sbyang ba la zhi bas sbyong ba ni /
NK041(di)008:401: mtheb kyu'i gtor ma rten la bskor tshul gyis /
NK041(di)008:402: sarba big+h+n+aam na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo bi
NK041(di)008:403: shwa mu she b+h+yah sarba tat+kham ung+ga te s+pha ra
NK041(di)008:404: na h+ai mam ga ga na kham gri h+ne dam
NK041(di)008:406: zhes lan gsum gyis gtor ma bzed zhal du bzhag /
NK041(di)008:408: ting lo dang chang bu ni rdzas zhi ba /
NK041(di)008:409: sum+b+ha'i sngags ni drag po ste /
NK041(di)008:410: rdo rje gsor ba dang bcas pas drag tu bzla zhing /
NK041(di)008:411: gtor ma rten la bskor nas bzed zhal du bzhag /
NK041(di)008:413: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ko&a ham /
NK041(di)008:414: rang nyid skad cig gis rdo rje h+aum mdzad khro
NK041(di)008:415: bo'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba'i skur gyur pa'i
NK041(di)008:416: dpral bar / mgrin par +aah thugs kar h+aum /
NK041(di)008:417: h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas khro bo'i sprin rab
NK041(di)008:418: 'byams dpag tu med pa badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs spyan
NK041(di)008:421: ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od //
NK041(di)008:422: ma rig 'dod pa'i mun khams thams cad sreg /
NK041(di)008:423: zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms //
NK041(di)008:424: dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can //
NK041(di)008:425: log 'dren srin po'i mtha' gnon dgra 'dul ba //
NK041(di)008:426: rig pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal bzhugs so 'tshal //
NK041(di)008:427: log 'dren 'dul ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
NK041(di)008:428: 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol //
NK041(di)008:429: zhes khro bo nam mkha' gang bar bzhugs pa la /
NK041(di)008:430: kro d+ha r+aa dza sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham nas /
NK041(di)008:433: chos nyid stong pa gnyis med ngang nyid las //
NK041(di)008:434: 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong zhing //
NK041(di)008:435: thabs la mkhas pas 'jigs byed skur ston pa //
NK041(di)008:436: khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:437: ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang //
NK041(di)008:438: sku yi cha lugs za byed rngams stabs can //
NK041(di)008:439: gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras //
NK041(di)008:440: ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag lhag pa'i ye shes rol par ston mdzad cing //
NK041(di)008:441: sdigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams //
NK041(di)008:442: nyon mongs dug chen rtsad nas 'joms mdzad pa'i //
NK041(di)008:443: sbrul gdug rgyan gyis brgyan la bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
NK041(di)008:444: dpa' bo'i stangs stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
NK041(di)008:445: nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis //
NK041(di)008:446: bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar //
NK041(di)008:447: glog stong 'khyug 'dra'i khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs //
NK041(di)008:448: rngams pa'i nga ro 'brug sgra stong bzhin sgrogs //
NK041(di)008:449: khro rgyal bgegs tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:451: 'jigs pa'i h+aum sgra nges sgrogs shing //
NK041(di)008:452: bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms mdzad pa //
NK041(di)008:453: dngos grub ma lus stsol ba'i lha //
NK041(di)008:454: bgegs kyi dgra la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:457: rje btsun rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i dpal
NK041(di)008:458: ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' bden pa
NK041(di)008:459: dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dge 'dun gsang sngags dang /
NK041(di)008:464: ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa dang /
NK041(di)008:465: chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang /
NK041(di)008:466: chos can rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa'i bden pa dang /
NK041(di)008:467: bden pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
NK041(di)008:468: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis
NK041(di)008:469: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK041(di)008:470: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du /
NK041(di)008:471: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten rab tu gnas par bgyi yis /
NK041(di)008:472: gang su yang rung ba'i 'byung po gdug pa can
NK041(di)008:473: g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams 'dir ma gnas
NK041(di)008:475: gal te mi 'gro na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK041(di)008:476: cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las
NK041(di)008:477: byung ba'i khro bo'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i me
NK041(di)008:478: rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed rnams kyi mgo tshal
NK041(di)008:479: pa brgyar 'gas par gyur ta re /
NK041(di)008:480: sum+b+ha sogs drag sngags bzla zhing /
NK041(di)008:481: gu gul dang bdud rtsi lnga'i dud pas bdug /
NK041(di)008:483: rol mo'i sgra drag po'i tsham rngam dang bcas pas gtor ma phyi rol du dor ro //
NK041(di)008:484: gnyis pa mi shis pa sbyang ba ni /
NK041(di)008:486: gro zan gyi changs bus rten la dril phyis bya
NK041(di)008:487: zhing las sngags bzla bas bskor te gsog snod du
NK041(di)008:488: bzhag / de bzhin du zho zan gyis kyang bskor nas gsog snod du bzhag /
NK041(di)008:489: slar yang lag gnyis kyis yungs kar bzung ba /
NK041(di)008:490: h+aum bzla bas g.yon du bskor zhing /
NK041(di)008:491: sarba p+aa pam da ha na badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:493: de bzhin du chu la bzla bas g.yas su bskor zhing me chur blugs /
NK041(di)008:494: me chu gnyis kyang gsog snod kyi zho zan la gsigs te /
NK041(di)008:495: gnas bya'i rten dang bdag cag yon mchod rnams mi
NK041(di)008:496: shis par byed pa'i byur dang skal ba ngan pa
NK041(di)008:497: thams cad sh+ain+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:498: zhes rol mo dang bcas pas phyir dor ro //
NK041(di)008:499: gsum pa sdig pa sbyang ba ni /
NK041(di)008:500: bdag dang sbyin pa'i bdag pos 'khor ba thog ma
NK041(di)008:501: med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad snying
NK041(di)008:502: gar yi ge kam nag po'i rnam par gnas pa
NK041(di)008:503: lte ba'i gtum mo ye shes kyi mes ded /
NK041(di)008:504: sna sgor sdig pa rwa can gyi rnam pas thon
NK041(di)008:505: nas mdun gyi til la thim pa de nyid g.yas
NK041(di)008:506: su ye shes kyi mes bsreg /
NK041(di)008:507: g.yon du chos nyid kyi rgya mtshor dor bar bsam la /
NK041(di)008:508: sarba p+aa pam da ha na b+hasmim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:509: zhes lan gsum la sogs pas me chur dor la /
NK041(di)008:510: bdag dang sbyin pa'i bdag pos tshe 'khor ba thog
NK041(di)008:511: ma med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad
NK041(di)008:513: zhes me yang chur blug nas phyir dor ro //
NK041(di)008:514: drug pa bkru zhing phyi ba ni /
NK041(di)008:515: khrus dkyil gyi mchod pa rnams yid kyis byin rlabs byas nas /
NK041(di)008:521: khrus ras rnams tshar du dngar bas /
NK041(di)008:522: dngos su bkru 'os shing bskyod bde ba rnams khrus stegs kyi khar bkod /
NK041(di)008:523: mi rung ba rnams me long du shar ba'i gzugs brnyan nyid bkru ba las /
NK041(di)008:525: gang 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
NK041(di)008:526: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
NK041(di)008:532: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
NK041(di)008:533: ldan 'das de la yo byad thams cad dang ldan
NK041(di)008:535: khrus kyi khang pa shin tu dri zhim pa //
NK041(di)008:536: shel gyi sa gzhi gsal zhing 'tsher ba bstar //
NK041(di)008:537: rin chen 'bar ba'i ka ba yid 'ong ldan //
NK041(di)008:538: mu tig 'od chags bla re bres pa der //
NK041(di)008:539: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de sras la //
NK041(di)008:540: rin chen bum pa mang po spos kyi chus //
NK041(di)008:541: yid 'ong legs par gang ba glu dang ni //
NK041(di)008:542: rol mor bcas pa du mas khrus bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:545: badz+ra a mri ta sogs las sngags bzla bzhin ras bal gyis khrus chal me long la byugs /
NK041(di)008:546: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya bi shwa d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aas drud cing mnye /
NK041(di)008:547: h+aum t+r+aam h+r+aih+aah zhes dur pir gyis 'bru mar byug /
NK041(di)008:548: de bsal phyir k+aa ya'i sngags kyis shun lpags sogs dril phyis btab nas drud la /
NK041(di)008:550: 'di ni khrus mchog dpal dang ldan //
NK041(di)008:551: thugs rje'i chu ni bla na med //
NK041(di)008:552: byin rlabs ye shes chu yis ni /
NK041(di)008:553: ci 'dod dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
NK041(di)008:554: gan+d+he s+n+aa na sogs bum sgrub bzhin brjod pas rol mo dang bcas pas khrus gsol /
NK041(di)008:555: de dag sku la mtshungs pa med pa'i gos //
NK041(di)008:556: gtsang la dri rab bgos pas sku phyi'o //
NK041(di)008:557: h+aum t+r+ai h+r+aih+aah k+aa ya bi shwa d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:562: sku phyi ba rnams kun la shes par byas nas /
NK041(di)008:563: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
NK041(di)008:564: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
NK041(di)008:565: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
NK041(di)008:566: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:567: tri ma d+hu 'di ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chu //
NK041(di)008:568: ser sna'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
NK041(di)008:569: gtong ba dri yis legs bgos chus //
NK041(di)008:570: khrus legs mdzad la sku khrus gsol //
NK041(di)008:571: da d+hi 'di ni tshul khrims khrims 'chal tshul khrims
NK041(di)008:572: dri khrus legs mdzad la pha la 'di ni bzod
NK041(di)008:573: pa'i khong khro'i dri ma bzod pa dri yis khrus
NK041(di)008:575: 'di ni brtson 'grus le lo'i dri ma brtson 'grus
NK041(di)008:576: dri yis khrus legs mdzad la l+aa dz+aa 'di ni
NK041(di)008:577: bsam gtan rnam g.yeng dri ma bsam gtan dri khrus
NK041(di)008:578: legs mdzad o sha d+hi 'di ni shes rab rang
NK041(di)008:579: bzhin shes 'chal dri ma shes rab dri yis khrus
NK041(di)008:580: legs mdzad la sku khrus gsol //
NK041(di)008:581: ma ni sogs re re'i mthar rol mo dang bcas pas khrus gsol /
NK041(di)008:582: bum rdzas bye brag tu ma phye na /
NK041(di)008:583: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka ta sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h+aum /
NK041(di)008:585: khrus chab sde tshan bzhi'i tshar re bum bzung re dang sbyar /
NK041(di)008:586: khrus chal gcig tu bsdus na ni de kho nas thams cad la bya'o //
NK041(di)008:587: bum pa brgyad pa'i tshe slar yang dri'i bum pas bkru zhing /
NK041(di)008:588: chu bo drug gis khrus byas pas //
NK041(di)008:589: bag chags rnam drug sbyangs nas ni //
NK041(di)008:590: gang la nyes pa mi mnga' ba'i //
NK041(di)008:592: dri chu drug gis khrus byas pas //
NK041(di)008:593: dri ma rnam drug sbyong mdzad cing //
NK041(di)008:594: rgya che'i yon tan drug ldan pa'i //
NK041(di)008:595: khrus legs mdzad la nyes mi mnga' //
NK041(di)008:596: dri ma rnam drug dag pa yis //
NK041(di)008:597: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pas //
NK041(di)008:598: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod don du //
NK041(di)008:599: dad pas bdag gis khrus bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:600: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka ta sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h+aum /
NK041(di)008:601: de dag sku la sogs kyis sku phyi /
NK041(di)008:603: sku mchog rnam dag lta bas mi ngoms la //
NK041(di)008:604: ngo mtshar skyon bral mkha' dbyings nyi gsal 'dra //
NK041(di)008:605: chos kyi sku la bgres pa mi mnga' yang //
NK041(di)008:606: sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du //
NK041(di)008:607: chu gtsang sman spos lo ma 'dag chal chus //
NK041(di)008:608: 'gro ba'i lus sems sdug bsngal nad bsal te //
NK041(di)008:609: nyes pa'i skyon bral 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba //
NK041(di)008:610: dam pa'i sku mchog bdag gis thob par shog /
NK041(di)008:611: sarba sogs rol mor bcas pas khrus gsol /
NK041(di)008:612: bde gshegs sku gsum dpe dang mtshan mnga' yang //
NK041(di)008:613: 'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku cir yang gda' //
NK041(di)008:614: rin chen dbyig ltar nyes pa'i skyon bral yang //
NK041(di)008:615: 'jig rten sri zhu gus pa'i tshul tsam du //
NK041(di)008:616: sdig med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab basngagasa pa'i //
NK041(di)008:617: ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas //
NK041(di)008:618: nyon mongs dug gsum sgrib pa kun byang nas //
NK041(di)008:619: sku gsum ngang du bdag cag 'gyur bar shog /
NK041(di)008:620: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya bi sho d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aas sku phyi /
NK041(di)008:621: stong gsum kun tu dri ngad ldang ba yi //
NK041(di)008:622: dri mchog rnams kyi thub dbang rnams kyi sku //
NK041(di)008:623: gser sbyangs btso ma byi dor byas pa ltar //
NK041(di)008:624: 'od chags 'bar ba de dag byug par bgyi //
NK041(di)008:626: zhes dung zhal gyi dris byug /
NK041(di)008:627: de nas de la kha dog legs bsgyur ba'i //
NK041(di)008:628: na bza' shin tu dri zhim dam pa 'bul //
NK041(di)008:629: gos bzang srab la 'jam pa sna tshogs dang //
NK041(di)008:630: rgyan mchog brgya phrag dag kyang dbul bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:631: badz+ra w+aa sa se pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:633: gsum po ni byug pa na bza' rgyan zhes khrus kyi rjes 'agro'o //
NK041(di)008:635: sna tshogs dbang po'i gzhu ltar zhes sogs kyis na bza' dang /
NK041(di)008:636: rgyal ba mtshan dpe'i rang bzhin zhes sogs kyis rgyan
NK041(di)008:637: 'bul ba tha dad du byas na yang legs so
NK041(di)008:638: // gzhan yang skabs 'dir shis brjod mang du byed par bshad mod /
NK041(di)008:639: gong gi phyin drug gi tshigs bcad nyid shis brjod yin pas de tsam gyis chog shes par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:640: bdun pa brten bskyed pa ni /
NK041(di)008:642: spyi khyab tu bskyed nas bsang sbyang /
NK041(di)008:643: stong pa'i ngang las dkyil 'khor gang la brten pa de nyid dam bye brag tu /
NK041(di)008:644: sku rten rnams seng ges btegs pa'i rin po che'i
NK041(di)008:645: khri sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi zla brtsegs pa'i steng
NK041(di)008:646: du / h+aum las rdo rje h+aum gis mtshan pa
NK041(di)008:647: las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po
NK041(di)008:648: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu
NK041(di)008:649: 'dzin pas snyems ma dkar mo rdo dril 'dzin pa
NK041(di)008:650: dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bskyed /
NK041(di)008:651: mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang sogs seng ges btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri sogs kyi steng du /
NK041(di)008:652: las 'khor lo gyis mtshan pa las rnam snang dkar po 'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK041(di)008:653: spyan ma dkar mo 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK041(di)008:655: glegs bam rnams rma byas btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri sogs kyi steng du /
NK041(di)008:656: +aam las pad+ma +aam gis mtshan pa las snang ba
NK041(di)008:657: mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pa
NK041(di)008:658: / gos dkar mo dmar mo pad+ma dang pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK041(di)008:659: phyag mtshan rnams glang pos btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri sogs kyi steng du /
NK041(di)008:660: h+aum las rdo rje h+aum gis mtshan pa las mi
NK041(di)008:661: bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin
NK041(di)008:662: pa / dbyings phyug ma sngon mo rdo rje dang
NK041(di)008:663: rdo rje'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor
NK041(di)008:664: pa / ba / rin po che'i rgyan sogs rta
NK041(di)008:665: mchog gis btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri sogs kyi
NK041(di)008:666: pa / ba / steng du / s+w+aa las rin
NK041(di)008:667: po che s+w+aas mtshan pa las rin 'byung ser po
NK041(di)008:668: rin po che dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK041(di)008:669: m+aa ma k+ai ser mo rin po che dang rin
NK041(di)008:670: po che'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor
NK041(di)008:671: ba / go cha sogs shang shang gis btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri sogs kyi steng du /
NK041(di)008:672: h+aa las ral gri h+aas mtshan pa las don grub ljang gu ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK041(di)008:673: dam tshig sgrol ma ljang gu ral gri dang ral
NK041(di)008:674: gri'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba
NK041(di)008:675: / zhes pa rnams gang gi tshe yang mthar /
NK041(di)008:676: thams cad kyang zhi zhing 'dzum la mtshan dpe'i lang
NK041(di)008:677: tsho rab tu rgyas pa dar gyi na bza' dang
NK041(di)008:678: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing 'od
NK041(di)008:679: dang 'od zer mtha' yas pa spro ba'i bdag nyid
NK041(di)008:682: de rnams kyi spyi bor dkar po /
NK041(di)008:684: snying gar h+aum sngon po rnams kyis mtshan par bsam mo //
NK041(di)008:685: brgyad pa spyan drang ba sogs ni /
NK041(di)008:686: bdag dang rten gyi snying ga'i h+aum las 'od zer
NK041(di)008:687: 'phros pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsam gyis mi
NK041(di)008:688: khyab pa'i tshogs thams cad badz+ra sa m+aa dzah zhes
NK041(di)008:689: rdo rje bsdu ba'i rgya dang rdo dril spos dang
NK041(di)008:690: bcas pas / ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing //
NK041(di)008:691: bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzad 'joms mdzad lha //
NK041(di)008:692: dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)008:693: bcom ldan 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK041(di)008:694: bcom ldan bskal pa grangs med du ma ru //
NK041(di)008:695: 'gro la brtse phyir thugs rje rnam sbyangs shing //
NK041(di)008:696: smon lam rgya chen dgongs pa yongs rdzogs pa'i //
NK041(di)008:697: khyed bzhed 'gro don mdzad dus 'di lags na //
NK041(di)008:698: de phyir chos dbyings pho brang lhun grub nas //
NK041(di)008:699: rdzu 'phrul byin rlabs sna tshogs ston mdzad cing //
NK041(di)008:700: mtha' yas sems can tshogs rnams bsgral ba'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:701: yongs dag 'khor dang bcas te gshegs su gsol //
NK041(di)008:702: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug gtso //
NK041(di)008:703: btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing //
NK041(di)008:704: nyi ma las lhag gzi brjid che //
NK041(di)008:705: dad pas spyan ni drang bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:706: zhi zhing thugs rje che ldan pa //
NK041(di)008:707: dul zhing bsam gtan sa la bzhugs //
NK041(di)008:708: chos dang ye shes chags bral ba //
NK041(di)008:709: kun tu mi bzad nus par ldan //
NK041(di)008:710: tshur spyon tshur spyon zhi dag la //
NK041(di)008:711: thub pa skyes mchog thams cad mkhyen //
NK041(di)008:712: shin tu legs byas gzugs brnyan ni //
NK041(di)008:713: mchod pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK041(di)008:714: zhes spyan drangs nas phyi 'brang gi bgegs rnams sum+b+ha
NK041(di)008:715: bzla zhing yungs thun rol mo dang bcas pas bskrad
NK041(di)008:716: / bcom ldan 'dir ni byon pa legs //
NK041(di)008:717: bdag cag bsod nams skal bar ldan //
NK041(di)008:718: bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang //
NK041(di)008:719: thugs la dgongs shing gnang bar mdzod //
NK041(di)008:720: badz+ra ar+g+ham pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:722: ji ltar bltams pa sogs kyis khrus gsol /
NK041(di)008:723: bdag dang 'gro la thugs rtse'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:724: nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni //
NK041(di)008:725: ji srid mchod pa bdag bgyid na //
NK041(di)008:726: de srid bcom ldan bzhugs su gsol //
NK041(di)008:727: pad+ma ka ma la ya s+t+wam gyis gdan phul /
NK041(di)008:728: badz+ra push+pe pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:729: zhes sogs nyer spyod rol mor bcas pas mchod do //
NK041(di)008:730: dgu pa dgug gzhug bya ba ni /
NK041(di)008:731: so so'i phyag rgya bcings te /
NK041(di)008:732: badz+ra ang+gu sha dzah dam tshig pa nye bar bkug /
NK041(di)008:737: badz+ra +aa be sha ya hoh ro gcig tu dgyes par bsam mo //
NK041(di)008:738: bcu pa rgyas gdab pa ni /
NK041(di)008:739: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya rten gyi gnas gsum du bzhag pa'am /
NK041(di)008:741: gnas bya'i lha rnams kyi dpral bar las 'khor lo
NK041(di)008:742: dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa gyis mtshan pas rgyas btab
NK041(di)008:743: par bsam la // dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba //
NK041(di)008:744: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi sku //
NK041(di)008:745: deng 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)008:746: sku yi dbyig tu dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:747: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK041(di)008:748: mgrin par +aahls pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa
NK041(di)008:749: +aahs mtshan pas +aah dpal ldan sangs rgyas gsung 'chang
NK041(di)008:750: ba // rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi gsung //
NK041(di)008:751: deng 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)008:752: gsung gi dbyig tu dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:753: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa w+aa ka badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK041(di)008:754: thugs kar h+aum las rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa h+aum gis mtshan pas h+aum /
NK041(di)008:755: dpal ldan sangs rgyas thugs 'chang ba //
NK041(di)008:756: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi thugs //
NK041(di)008:757: deng 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)008:758: thugs kyi dbyig tu dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:759: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK041(di)008:761: bcu gcig pa dbang bskur ba ni /
NK041(di)008:762: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od
NK041(di)008:763: zer gyis dbang gi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs
NK041(di)008:764: lnga sras dang bcas pa thams cad badz+ra sa m+aa
NK041(di)008:765: dzahs spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa
NK041(di)008:766: la / badz+ra ar+g+ham pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa nas shap+da'i bar gyis mchod /
NK041(di)008:767: chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med kyang //
NK041(di)008:768: gzugs sku 'ja' tshon bzhin du so sor gsal //
NK041(di)008:769: thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i //
NK041(di)008:770: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:772: rdo rje can gyi sangs rgyas la //
NK041(di)008:773: 'gro ba skyob pa'i ched du dbang //
NK041(di)008:774: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar stsal //
NK041(di)008:775: de ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)008:776: zhes gsol ba btab pas nam mkha' gang ba'i de
NK041(di)008:777: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i dgongs pa
NK041(di)008:778: mdzad / yum rnams kyis bum pa'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur /
NK041(di)008:779: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis pa'i glu dbyangs brjod /
NK041(di)008:780: lha mo rnams kyi gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa sgreng zhing /
NK041(di)008:781: rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas mchod rdzas kyi char 'bebs /
NK041(di)008:782: khro bo rnams kyis bgegs skrod pa'i las mdzad par bsam ste /
NK041(di)008:783: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
NK041(di)008:784: kun gyi bdag nyid rigs kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /
NK041(di)008:785: ma lus sems can bskyed mdzad bde ba chen po ste //
NK041(di)008:786: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)008:787: ces brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)008:788: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
NK041(di)008:789: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
NK041(di)008:790: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
NK041(di)008:791: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:792: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka ta sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h+aum /
NK041(di)008:796: chu'i lhag ma spyi bor 'khyil ba las rnam snang
NK041(di)008:797: sogs bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lngas dbu brgyan par
NK041(di)008:798: bsam zhing / h+aum t+r+aam h+r+aih+aahpany+tsa ku la mu ku ta a b+hi shiny+tsa mi /
NK041(di)008:799: zhes dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur /
NK041(di)008:800: trum zhes rdo rje bka' nan gyis go bgo /
NK041(di)008:801: badz+ra tu sh+ya hoh zhes thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:802: bcu gnyis pa mchod bstod bzlas pa ni /
NK041(di)008:803: mchod rdzas rnams bsang sbyangs byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK041(di)008:804: phyogs bcu rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams na //
NK041(di)008:805: me tog sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa //
NK041(di)008:806: dngos dang yid kyis rnam sprul ji snyed pas //
NK041(di)008:807: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)008:808: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa pa ri w+aa ra push+pe pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:809: de bzhin du me tog gi gnas su /
NK041(di)008:822: mi rtog rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes ni //
NK041(di)008:823: dmigs med shes rab yum gyi ngang du rtogs //
NK041(di)008:824: thugs rje'i bye brag sna tshogs cir yang ston //
NK041(di)008:825: rdo rje sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:826: chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med kyang //
NK041(di)008:827: gzugs sku 'ja' tshon bzhin du so sor gsal //
NK041(di)008:828: thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa //
NK041(di)008:829: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:830: 'gro ba rgyud lnga 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK041(di)008:831: sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gyis gzir 'gro gzigs nas //
NK041(di)008:832: thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa //
NK041(di)008:833: thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:834: sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:835: sems can khams na bzhugs shing spyod gyur kyang //
NK041(di)008:836: chags pas ma gos pad+ma ltar dag pa //
NK041(di)008:837: 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK041(di)008:838: sems can bkren pa chos kyis phongs gyur pa //
NK041(di)008:839: ma rig 'thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams //
NK041(di)008:840: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa //
NK041(di)008:841: ye shes sgron me khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:842: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa rnams //
NK041(di)008:843: thugs rje thabs dang shes rab grur bcug ste //
NK041(di)008:844: zhi ba rin chen gling du skyel mdzad pa //
NK041(di)008:845: kun gyi ded dpon de la kun nas 'dud //
NK041(di)008:846: sems can las kyi chu bor nub gyur rnams //
NK041(di)008:847: dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad cing //
NK041(di)008:848: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad la sbyor mdzad pa //
NK041(di)008:849: gsung gi mnga' bdag khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:850: zhes pa rnams kyis bstod rjes /
NK041(di)008:851: gnas bya'i sngags bye brag pa rnams dang /
NK041(di)008:852: spyir yi ge brgya ba dang /
NK041(di)008:853: rten 'brel snying po yang brgya rtsa sogs bazla'o //
NK041(di)008:854: bcu gsum pa gtor ma gtong ba ni /
NK041(di)008:855: yi dam chos skyong rnams kyi gtor ma dang /
NK041(di)008:856: 'jig rten pa rnams la cha gsum gyi cho gas bsngo bar bya'o //
NK041(di)008:857: bcu bzhi pa snyan gsan dbab pa ni /
NK041(di)008:858: pus mo g.yas sa la btsugs /
NK041(di)008:859: lag g.yas rdo rje dang bcas pas spos snod thogs /
NK041(di)008:862: lce h+aum las skyes pa'i rdo rjer mos la /
NK041(di)008:863: rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)008:864: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:865: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
NK041(di)008:866: khyod rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:867: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rab gnas //
NK041(di)008:868: mgon po bdag ni bgyi bar 'tshal //
NK041(di)008:869: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
NK041(di)008:870: thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas kyang //
NK041(di)008:871: tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas pa //
NK041(di)008:872: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
NK041(di)008:873: zhes lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab pas gnang ba byin par bsam zhing /
NK041(di)008:875: bco lnga pa nongs bshags gshegs gsol ni /
NK041(di)008:876: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum gyis bzod par gsol nas /
NK041(di)008:878: rten la phab pa'i ye shes pa rnams mdun gyi nam mkhar gshegs par bsam zhing /
NK041(di)008:880: bcu drug pa rten dgab pa ni /
NK041(di)008:881: sku gzugs kyi dpral ba mgrin pa thugs ka dbu gtsug phyag rnams dri bzang gis byug /
NK041(di)008:883: rdo rjes rten la reg nas /
NK041(di)008:887: zhes pas khebs ser pos ma mthong bar dgab /
NK041(di)008:888: de dag gi mthar bdag mdun gyi cho ga'i rjes
NK041(di)008:889: chog rnams byas nas bdag bsrungs te nyal ba'i rnal
NK041(di)008:891: de dag ni sta gon nam lhag gnas kyi cho ga'o //
NK041(di)008:892: gnyis pa cho ga dngos gzhi'i sdoms ni /
NK041(di)008:893: bdag mdun sgrub mchod sbyang bkru phyi //
NK041(di)008:894: gsol btab rten bskyed spyan drangs la //
NK041(di)008:895: dgug cing rgyas gdab dbang bskur bya //
NK041(di)008:896: mchod bstod spyan sogs dbye rten bsgyur //
NK041(di)008:897: mnga' dbul rnam bzhi brtan bzhugs so //
NK041(di)008:900: tho rengs ldang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis langs nas mchod gtor gsar pa rgya cher bsham /
NK041(di)008:901: khrus byas rgyan gos mdzes par bstar /
NK041(di)008:902: bdag mdun gyi sgrub mchod dbang len pa bum pa sgrub pa rnams sta gon bzhin bya ba'am /
NK041(di)008:904: gzungs bum sgrub pa sta gon du song bas 'dir ma byas kyang chog /
NK041(di)008:906: gsum pa bkru zhing phyi ba ni sta gon bzhin
NK041(di)008:907: las 'grub tu rung na khrus kyi las nyi ma
NK041(di)008:908: 'char ka dang bsgrig par gsungs so //
NK041(di)008:909: bzhi pa gsol ba gdab cing sems bskyed pa ni /
NK041(di)008:910: kun gyis me tog thogs pas 'greng ste dkon mchog
NK041(di)008:911: gsum gyi yon tan rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas
NK041(di)008:912: / gang 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
NK041(di)008:913: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK041(di)008:914: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
NK041(di)008:917: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba /
NK041(di)008:918: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
NK041(di)008:919: pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i
NK041(di)008:920: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad
NK041(di)008:921: bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa /
NK041(di)008:922: yon tan thams cad kyi mnga' bdag rdo rje'i rigs dang /
NK041(di)008:926: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i
NK041(di)008:927: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na
NK041(di)008:928: bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad
NK041(di)008:929: lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan
NK041(di)008:930: pa dang bde ba'i phyir rten 'di rnams la 'byon
NK041(di)008:932: zhes mthun par brjod cing gnas bya'i sngags dang /
NK041(di)008:933: na mo b+ha ga wa te sh+aakya mu na ye /
NK041(di)008:938: ma h+aa mu na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:939: zhes bzla zhing spos dang rol mor bcas pas me tog gi char dbab bo //
NK041(di)008:941: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed
NK041(di)008:942: nas 'gro ba mtha' dag dang khyad par gang gi
NK041(di)008:943: don du bya ba de la byams snying rje byang
NK041(di)008:944: chub kyi sems yun ring du bsgoms la /
NK041(di)008:945: ngo mtshar chen po grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang
NK041(di)008:946: ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag
NK041(di)008:948: bdag gis sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ngo //
NK041(di)008:949: 'khor ba'i gcong rong chen po las bsgral bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:950: phas kyi rgol ba bdud dang log 'dren thams cad pham par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:951: mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyogs pa thams cad bsal bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:952: nga rgyal gyi ri bo bsnyil bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:953: skye bo'i ljon shing rtsad nas gcod do //
NK041(di)008:954: 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar rlog go //
NK041(di)008:955: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:956: ma dad pa dang phyi rol pa dag dang lta
NK041(di)008:957: ba phyin ci log pa dag yang dag pa'i lta
NK041(di)008:958: ba la gzud cing dad par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:959: las kyi chu bo bzlog par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:960: srid pa'i rgya mtsho skem par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:961: chos kyi sgron me spar bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:962: byang chub kyi lam bstan par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:963: bzod pa dang nges pa la gzud do //
NK041(di)008:964: bsam gtan gyi bde ba rtser stsal to //
NK041(di)008:965: 'dod chags kyi me dpung zhi bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:966: zhe sdang gi mtshon rnon po gzhom par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:968: phrag dog gi 'tshub ma zhi bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:969: ser sna'i mdud pa dgrol bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:970: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:971: 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'jug cing gnas par bagyi'o //
NK041(di)008:972: de bas na bdag la las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog stsol zhing gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
NK041(di)008:973: zhes gsol zhing me tog 'thor ro //
NK041(di)008:974: lnga pa rten bskyed pa dang /
NK041(di)008:975: drug pa ye shes pa spyan drangs pa dang /
NK041(di)008:976: bdun pa dgug cing rgyas gdab pa rnams kyang sta gon bzhin no //
NK041(di)008:977: brgyad pa dbang bskur ba ni /
NK041(di)008:978: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gang la brten pa de nyid
NK041(di)008:979: kyi dbang chog las 'byung ba ltar shes par bya
NK041(di)008:980: zhing / spyi tsam du bstan pa ni /
NK041(di)008:981: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis dbang lha spyan 'dren pa /
NK041(di)008:982: mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa /
NK041(di)008:983: shis brjod byed pa rnams sta gon bzhin las /
NK041(di)008:984: yum rnams kyis bum pa'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur
NK041(di)008:985: zhes pa'i dod du bum pa sogs dbang rdzas so
NK041(di)008:986: sos dbang bskur zhes bsgyur ba tsam las sta gon
NK041(di)008:988: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur zhing /
NK041(di)008:989: che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs shing //
NK041(di)008:990: byang chub sems rab chus gang ba //
NK041(di)008:991: rnam par dag pa'i bum pa 'dis //
NK041(di)008:992: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:993: badz+r+ai b+ha wa a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:995: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)008:996: sangs rgyas kun gyis basngagasa pa yi //
NK041(di)008:997: rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang //
NK041(di)008:998: dar dpyangs dag gi dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:999: badz+ra rat+na mu ku ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1001: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)008:1002: don gyi byang chub sems yin pas //
NK041(di)008:1003: gnyis med don gyi ngo bo 'dis //
NK041(di)008:1004: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:1007: 'di ni shes rab kun gyi dngos //
NK041(di)008:1008: byang chub bsgom phyir rang bzhin te //
NK041(di)008:1009: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
NK041(di)008:1010: khyod la de ring 'dis dbang bskur //
NK041(di)008:1011: badz+ra g+han+de a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1013: rdo rje dang dril bu spyi bor 'dzin pas /
NK041(di)008:1014: 'di ni sangs rgyas dngos yin te //
NK041(di)008:1015: rab tu basngagasa pa gsang ba'i ming //
NK041(di)008:1016: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bas //
NK041(di)008:1017: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)008:1018: badz+ra sat+wa n+aa ma a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1019: zhes rigs dang mthun pa'i ming gdags pa ste /
NK041(di)008:1020: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur /
NK041(di)008:1022: phung po lnga sangs rgyas lngar gnas bsgyur /
NK041(di)008:1023: dbang rtags su de bzhin gshegs pa lngas dbu brgyan par bsam mo //
NK041(di)008:1024: rdo rje slob dpon gyii dbang ni /
NK041(di)008:1025: gnas bya'i lha thams cad rdo rje dang dril bu
NK041(di)008:1026: 'dzin pa'i phyag gis rig ma la 'khyud par bsam
NK041(di)008:1027: zhing / thabs mchog ye shes rdo rje dang //
NK041(di)008:1028: shes rab chos kyi dril bu bzung //
NK041(di)008:1029: phyag rgya chen por byin rlabs te //
NK041(di)008:1030: khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur //
NK041(di)008:1033: badz+ra gan+de +aah dril bu 'khrol zhing dkur brten /
NK041(di)008:1034: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK041(di)008:1035: zhes 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum sbyin /
NK041(di)008:1036: slar yang nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
NK041(di)008:1037: rnams dbang gi bya ba la dgyes shing mchod pa'i
NK041(di)008:1038: rnam rol du ma dang bcas pas rin po che'i
NK041(di)008:1039: bum pa dkar po bdud rtsis gang ba yo bar
NK041(di)008:1040: bzung ste dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
NK041(di)008:1041: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
NK041(di)008:1042: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
NK041(di)008:1043: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
NK041(di)008:1044: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
NK041(di)008:1045: badz+ri b+h+aa wa a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1046: zhes gsung zhing bum pa'i chus dbang bskur /
NK041(di)008:1049: chu lhag ma spyi bor 'khyil ba las rdo rje sems dpas dbu brgyan nas /
NK041(di)008:1050: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK041(di)008:1051: kyang ye shes sems dpa'i tshul gyis rten rnams la
NK041(di)008:1052: gnyis med du thim par bsam zhing /
NK041(di)008:1053: su pra tish+tha badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1054: zhes lan mang du brjod cing me tog 'thor ro //
NK041(di)008:1056: gtso bo yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub
NK041(di)008:1057: sems kyi thig le gnas bya'i ljags la bzhag par
NK041(di)008:1058: mos te / ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis //
NK041(di)008:1059: rgyal sras tshogs la dbang bskur ltar //
NK041(di)008:1060: gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dbang //
NK041(di)008:1061: bu khyod la ni bdag gis sbyin //
NK041(di)008:1062: bo d+hi tsit+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum a ho ma h+aa su kham /
NK041(di)008:1064: dkyil 'khor pa'i thugs ka nas rig ma gzugs dang
NK041(di)008:1065: lang tshos brgyan pa byon nas gnas bya'i lha dang
NK041(di)008:1066: snyoms par zhugs par bsam zhing /
NK041(di)008:1067: lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma //
NK041(di)008:1068: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK041(di)008:1069: 'di rten mchog gi bde ba thob //
NK041(di)008:1070: khyed la rtag tu mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1071: pra dz+ny+aa dz+ny+aa na a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1073: rang bzhin lhan skyes kyi ye shes de kho na nyid thugs rgyud la bstar bar bsam zhing /
NK041(di)008:1075: thog mtha' dbus med gsal zhing stong //
NK041(di)008:1076: smra bsam brjod pa kun las 'das //
NK041(di)008:1077: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'o //
NK041(di)008:1078: d+harma k+aa ya a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1079: zhes dbang don la cung zad mnyam par bzhag go //
NK041(di)008:1080: de dag ni lha la dbang bskur ba'o //
NK041(di)008:1081: dgu pa mchod bstod ni sta gon gyi skabs bzhin no //
NK041(di)008:1082: bcu pa sbyan sogs dbye ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1083: dngul snod du gnas pa'i mar sbrang dang ka ra'i
NK041(di)008:1084: mig sman gser gyi thur mas blangs pa thogs la
NK041(di)008:1085: / ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
NK041(di)008:1086: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
NK041(di)008:1087: rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes spyan //
NK041(di)008:1088: sems can don du dbye bar bya //
NK041(di)008:1089: tsak+shu sa man+ta tsak+shu bi sho d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1090: ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pa dang ldan
NK041(di)008:1091: zhing sems can gyi don la gzigs pa 'jug pa'i
NK041(di)008:1092: mthu phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur
NK041(di)008:1094: de bzhin du rna drud thogs la /
NK041(di)008:1095: 'gro rnams chos kyis phongs pa la //
NK041(di)008:1096: rgyal bas chos kyi dung bus ltar //
NK041(di)008:1097: de bzhin sems can don gyi phyir //
NK041(di)008:1098: rgyal ba'i snyan ni dbye bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1099: d+r+ai bya kar+n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1102: zag bcas phung po'i dri sangs kyang //
NK041(di)008:1103: 'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir //
NK041(di)008:1104: rnam par dag pa'i dri brnyes ltar //
NK041(di)008:1105: rgyal ba'i shangs ni dbye bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1106: d+ai bya g+h+ra n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1109: chos kyi ro ni dga' ba yis //
NK041(di)008:1110: 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar //
NK041(di)008:1111: ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas rnams //
NK041(di)008:1112: 'bul phyir zhal ni dbye bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1113: d+ai bya mu kh+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1116: rgyal ba'i tshems dkar bzhi bcu la //
NK041(di)008:1117: mi gtsang rdul gyis ma gos kyang //
NK041(di)008:1118: bkur sti rin chen ljon shing 'dis //
NK041(di)008:1119: rgyal ba'i tshems ni dbye bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1120: d+ai bya dan+tu ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1121: zhes tshems kyi dri ma sbyangs bar bsam zhing skye
NK041(di)008:1122: mched bsal ba'i rjes 'brel du 'dod yon lngas mchod
NK041(di)008:1123: par yang bshad pas spro na bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1124: bcu gcig pa rten bsgyur ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1125: 'jug pa bde na rten rnams rgyun bzhugs kyi khri la skabs 'dir bkod nas /
NK041(di)008:1126: slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i thal mos
NK041(di)008:1127: reg cing se gol gyi sgras mtshon par gnas bya'i
NK041(di)008:1128: sngags lan gsum du brjod pas /
NK041(di)008:1129: bla sku lta bu la mtshon na /
NK041(di)008:1130: 'di ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su gyur pa las /
NK041(di)008:1131: bris 'bur gyi sku dang mtshungs pa'i lha so so'i
NK041(di)008:1132: snang brnyan gsal la ma 'dres pa mtshan nyid thams
NK041(di)008:1133: cad yongs su rdzogs pa sprul ba'i mdzad pa mngon
NK041(di)008:1134: sum du snang ba'i mthu byin dang ldan par gyur
NK041(di)008:1136: pusti rnams 'od dpag med yongs su gyur pa las
NK041(di)008:1137: lung dang rtogs pa'i dam chos dkon mchog dbyangs gsal
NK041(di)008:1138: gyi yi ge'i rnam pa glegs bam gyi gzugs su
NK041(di)008:1139: gyur / mchod rten rnams rnam snang yongs su gyur
NK041(di)008:1140: pa las ye shes kyi snang ba'i mchod rten snang
NK041(di)008:1142: de bzhin du mchod rten zhes pa'i gnas su /
NK041(di)008:1143: gtsug lag khang dang khang bzang la sogs pa so so'i snang brnyan ji ltar bar gyur /
NK041(di)008:1145: phyag mtshan rnams mi bskyod pa yongs su gyur pa
NK041(di)008:1146: las phyag mtshan so so'i mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'i gzugs
NK041(di)008:1148: sngar gnas bya so sor bskyed na zhal bsgyur mi dgos so //
NK041(di)008:1149: bcu gnyis pa mnga' dbul ba la bzhi las /
NK041(di)008:1150: dang po mchod bstod kyis mnga' dbul ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1151: mchod rdzas rnams byin gyis rlob pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)008:1152: rab 'byams rgya mtsho dpag med na //
NK041(di)008:1153: mchod yon ji snyed yod pa dang //
NK041(di)008:1154: bdag gis gus pas bshams pa 'di //
NK041(di)008:1155: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la 'bul //
NK041(di)008:1156: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1164: sil snyan zhes sbyar ba dang /
NK041(di)008:1172: de nas rin chen bdun ni /
NK041(di)008:1174: mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang ste //
NK041(di)008:1175: dngos grub 'dod pa sbyin pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:1176: nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul //
NK041(di)008:1177: tsakra rat+na badz+ra p+au dzi te +aahh+aum /
NK041(di)008:1191: zhes rim pa ji lta bar bsgyur bas so //
NK041(di)008:1193: kha dog dbyibs legs yid 'ong rgyan phreng ldan //
NK041(di)008:1194: phyogs dus kun na gzugs mchog ci mchis pa //
NK041(di)008:1195: mos blos rgyal ba sras bcas la 'bul na //
NK041(di)008:1196: bzhes shing bla med grub mchog stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)008:1197: r+au pa k+aa ma gu na badz+ra p+au dzi te +aahh+aum /
NK041(di)008:1198: phyogs dus kun na zin dang ma zin pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1199: yon tan tshig brjod sgra snyan yid 'ong ldan //
NK041(di)008:1200: mos blos bzhes shing shap+da k+aa ma phyogs dus kun na tsan+dana sbrul snying dang //
NK041(di)008:1201: a gar la sogs dbang po tshim byed dri //
NK041(di)008:1202: mos blos bzhes shing gan+d+he k+aa ma phyogs dus kun na ro dang bcud ldan pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1203: lus sems brtas byed ro mchog ci mchis pa //
NK041(di)008:1204: mos blos bzhes shing r+aa sa k+aa ma phyogs dus kun na 'jam mnyen 'khril chags pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1205: reg bya'i khyad par dbang po tshim byed pa //
NK041(di)008:1206: mos blos bzhes shing spar+she k+aa ma sogs gong bzhin /
NK041(di)008:1208: kun tu dga' ba nyams bzhi'i rnam 'gyur can //
NK041(di)008:1209: rdo rje pi wang gling bu rnga thabs bzung //
NK041(di)008:1210: yid 'phrog 'jo sgeg ldan pa'i lang tsho ma //
NK041(di)008:1211: nam mkha' rab 'byams gang bas 'khor lor mchod //
NK041(di)008:1215: mri tam ge h+r+aih mu ra dze +aa /
NK041(di)008:1216: de nas rkang pa mtha' ma gnyis gong bzhin las /
NK041(di)008:1217: mchog tu dga' ba nyams bzhi'i rdo rje sgeg bzhad glu dang gar mkhan ma //
NK041(di)008:1220: g+ai ti h+r+aih nirti +aah khyad par dga' ba me tog bdug spos snang gsal dri chab ma //
NK041(di)008:1223: +aa lo ke h+r+aih gan+d+he +aah lhan skyes dga' ba gzugs reg ro dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma //
NK041(di)008:1226: spar+she h+r+aih d+harma d+h+aa tu +aah gzhan yang rgyud sde
NK041(di)008:1227: gong ma'i lha rnams la bdud rtsi dang rak+ta gtor
NK041(di)008:1228: ma la sogs pas kyang ji ltar rigs pas mchod
NK041(di)008:1230: gnas bya'i lha so so'i sgos bstod rnams shes na bya zhing /
NK041(di)008:1231: mi nus na cho ga rang gzhung gi bstod pa'i
NK041(di)008:1232: rigs lnga spyi bstod sogs sngar brjod pa ltar ram
NK041(di)008:1234: gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid //
NK041(di)008:1235: skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang //
NK041(di)008:1236: bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku //
NK041(di)008:1237: rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud //
NK041(di)008:1238: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
NK041(di)008:1239: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NK041(di)008:1240: dkon mchog gsum gyi rtsa ba ste //
NK041(di)008:1241: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK041(di)008:1242: bla ma dpal ldan rdo rje sems //
NK041(di)008:1243: bde chen ye shes lnga yi bdag /
NK041(di)008:1244: dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed po mchog /
NK041(di)008:1245: de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:1246: mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa //
NK041(di)008:1247: zhes sogs dkon mchog gsum gyi spyi bstod dang /
NK041(di)008:1248: bstod par 'os pa thams cad la //
NK041(di)008:1249: zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi //
NK041(di)008:1250: lus btud pa yis rnam kun tu //
NK041(di)008:1251: mchog tu dad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)008:1253: 'gro ba rgyud lnga 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK041(di)008:1254: zhes sogs kyis kyang bstod do //
NK041(di)008:1255: gnyis pa nyer mkho'i yo byad kyi mnga' dbul ba la spyi dang /
NK041(di)008:1258: rdzas rnams dngos sam ri mor bris pa dang /
NK041(di)008:1259: 'bur du byas pa sogs ji ltar rigs pa 'bul ba las /
NK041(di)008:1260: man+dala gyi bkod pa phul la /
NK041(di)008:1261: sa gzhi spos chus byugs shing me tog bkram //
NK041(di)008:1262: ri rab gling bzhi nyi zlas brgyan pa 'di //
NK041(di)008:1263: sangs rgyas zhing du dmigs te phul ba yis //
NK041(di)008:1264: 'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)008:1266: rin chen sna bdun phul la /
NK041(di)008:1267: mi dbang rin chen sna bdun 'di dag ni //
NK041(di)008:1268: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa ma lus la //
NK041(di)008:1269: bshams shing yid kyis sprul te phul ba yis //
NK041(di)008:1270: 'gro ba mi zad gter la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)008:1272: theg mchog bla bre gdugs dang ba dan sgreng //
NK041(di)008:1273: bdud bcom rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dar 'phan dang //
NK041(di)008:1274: gar dang rol mo mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis //
NK041(di)008:1275: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par brgyan par bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1276: bkra shis rdzas brgyad phul la /
NK041(di)008:1277: lha yi dbang po lha min g.yul rgyal nas //
NK041(di)008:1278: bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa ltar //
NK041(di)008:1279: rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' la //
NK041(di)008:1280: bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1281: bilba dang star ka bum pa rnams phul la /
NK041(di)008:1282: 'jig rten khyim bdag rnams ni dpal brten nas //
NK041(di)008:1283: bilba star ka bum pa bzang dang bcas //
NK041(di)008:1284: mdun du bdar nas bkra shis byed pa ltar //
NK041(di)008:1285: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la dbul bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1287: phyogs dus kun na gzugs sgra dri dang ro //
NK041(di)008:1288: reg bya'i khyad par phun sum tshogs pa rnams //
NK041(di)008:1289: mos blos rgyal ba sras bcas la 'bul na //
NK041(di)008:1290: bzhes shing bla med grub mchog stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)008:1291: pany+tsa k+aa ma gu na badz+ra p+au dzi te +aahh+aum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1293: gnyis pa bye brag tu 'bul ba la /
NK041(di)008:1294: sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsum las /
NK041(di)008:1295: thog mar chags bral gyi sku rnams la 'dreg spyad phul la /
NK041(di)008:1296: rgyal ba'i dbu skra mthon mthing skyon bral yang //
NK041(di)008:1297: gzhan don sgrub cing khyim pa'i rtags spang phyir //
NK041(di)008:1298: dad pas gser gyi 'dreg spyad phul ba yis //
NK041(di)008:1299: 'gro kun sdug bsngal kun las grol bar shog /
NK041(di)008:1300: sarba shwa d+ha na kha ts+tshe da h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1301: chos gos rnam gsum phul la /
NK041(di)008:1302: dri med mtshan la sgrib bsal mi mnga' yang //
NK041(di)008:1303: dad pas ngur smrig rgyal mtshan phul ba yis //
NK041(di)008:1304: nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa'i sems can rnams //
NK041(di)008:1305: sangs rgyas brtul zhugs mchog la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)008:1306: d+ai bya was pra na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1307: chu tshags dang lhung bzed sogs phul la /
NK041(di)008:1308: 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)008:1309: rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la slob bya zhes //
NK041(di)008:1310: ji ltar thugs dam rgya chen bzhes pa ltar //
NK041(di)008:1311: mkho ba'i yo byad rnams ni dbul bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1312: u pa yo dz+ya te sa ri s+w+aa r+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1314: chags can gyi sku rnams la dung gi so mang phul la /
NK041(di)008:1315: dbu skra lcang lo mthon mthing g.yas 'khyil ba //
NK041(di)008:1316: rin chen 'bar bas brgyan pas rab tu mdzes //
NK041(di)008:1317: lha mi kun gyi lta bas mi ngoms te //
NK041(di)008:1318: bsod nams thob phyir rgyal ba'i dbu skra shad /
NK041(di)008:1319: k+aa ma ma la d+ha ra li h+aum /
NK041(di)008:1320: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i na bza' phul la /
NK041(di)008:1321: sna tshogs dbang po'i gzhu ltar rab bkra zhing //
NK041(di)008:1322: gang la reg na bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa //
NK041(di)008:1323: gos bzang rin chen bdag blo sbyang phyir 'bul //
NK041(di)008:1324: bzod pa dam pa'i gos kyis brgyan par shog /
NK041(di)008:1325: badz+ra w+aa sa se pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1326: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs phul la /
NK041(di)008:1327: bde gshegs sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
NK041(di)008:1328: byang chub phyogs kyi rgyan gyis mdzes lags kyang //
NK041(di)008:1329: rin chen do shal se mo do la sogs //
NK041(di)008:1330: rgyan gyi khyad par mang po dbul bar bgyi //
NK041(di)008:1337: 'bul tshig ni gong gi chu tshags sogs kyi skabs bzhin no //
NK041(di)008:1338: khro bo'i sku rnams la dpal gyi chas gos rnams phul la /
NK041(di)008:1340: bdud dpung ru dra bsgral ba'i tshe //
NK041(di)008:1341: dpal gyi sku la brgyan pa ltar //
NK041(di)008:1342: thod skam rin chen cod pan 'di //
NK041(di)008:1345: thod phreng sbrul chun phyag rgya lnga //
NK041(di)008:1346: zhing dang sa srung stag lpags gos //
NK041(di)008:1347: rnam gsum dur khrod mtshan ma'i rdzas //
NK041(di)008:1351: pad nyi dregs pa ru dra'i gdan //
NK041(di)008:1352: dug gsum sreg pa bskal ba'i me //
NK041(di)008:1353: drag po'i 'dod yon bsam mi khyab //
NK041(di)008:1354: khro rgyal 'khor dang bcas la dbul //
NK041(di)008:1356: gnyis pa gsung rten la khri phul la /
NK041(di)008:1357: rin chen du ma las grub seng ge'i khri //
NK041(di)008:1358: yid 'phrog sna tshogs gos kyis bkab pa 'di //
NK041(di)008:1359: spros bral gsung rab mchog la phul ba yis //
NK041(di)008:1360: 'gro rnams rdo rje'i gdan la 'khod par shog /
NK041(di)008:1363: sna tshogs dbang po'i gzhu ltar rab bkra shing //
NK041(di)008:1366: zung 'jug dam chos 'dzin pa kun bral yang //
NK041(di)008:1367: thabs dang shes rab rjes su 'brel gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1368: nyi zla lta bu'i rten 'brel dgab bya ba //
NK041(di)008:1369: phul bas skye bos zung 'jug thob par shog /
NK041(di)008:1370: badz+ra pra dz+ny+ao p+aa ya a d+aa ya +aahh+aum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1372: spros pa du ma rab tu rgyas gyur kyang //
NK041(di)008:1373: ye shes chen por ro gcig gyur pa ltar //
NK041(di)008:1374: glegs bam gcig gyur yo byad mchog phul bas //
NK041(di)008:1375: 'gro bas ye shes chen por rtogs par shog /
NK041(di)008:1376: badz+ra pusta ka ban+d+ha +aahh+aum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1380: sems can thams cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1381: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos mi nub cing yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1382: sems can thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par
NK041(di)008:1383: dag pa kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la 'jug
NK041(di)008:1384: par gyur cig / 'khor lo phul la /
NK041(di)008:1385: pra brta n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1386: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
NK041(di)008:1387: dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
NK041(di)008:1389: rnam par thar pa brgyad thob par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1390: ye shes lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1392: pa tam ka lam+b+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1393: sems can thams cad dus thams cad du cod pan
NK041(di)008:1394: dang lhab lhub la sogs pa mchod pa dang bsnyen
NK041(di)008:1395: bkur gyi rnam pa mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa
NK041(di)008:1396: 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
NK041(di)008:1397: de dag gi mchod rten dang /
NK041(di)008:1399: gsung rab la sogs pa dag la mchod pa byed par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1402: sems can thams cad chos kyi grags pa dang snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1404: kum+b+h+ai ra d+h+aa dza ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1405: sems can thams cad 'khor bar mi gtong mi 'dzin
NK041(di)008:1406: pas bdud bzhi las rgyal zhing chos mi nub pa'i
NK041(di)008:1409: pra ma na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1410: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i skyabs dang
NK041(di)008:1411: ldan zhing chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur cig
NK041(di)008:1412: / me tog gi phreng ba phul la /
NK041(di)008:1415: na ma stree ya d+h+aa a nu ga ta pra
NK041(di)008:1416: tish+tha te push+pa ke ta wa ta th+aa ga ta
NK041(di)008:1421: sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan
NK041(di)008:1422: te sku blta bas chog mi shes pa phun sum
NK041(di)008:1424: gdan gyi khyad par rnams phul la /
NK041(di)008:1425: sun+d+ha ri dza ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1426: sems can thams cad gdan gyi khyad par stobs bcu dang ldan pa glang po che'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1427: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa seng ge'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1428: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa rta'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1429: dbang bcu dang ldan pa rma bya'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1430: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa nam mkha' lding gi gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1431: 'gro ba'i re 'dod yid bzhin du skong ba'i rin po che'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1432: chags pa'i skyon thams cad spangs pa pad+ma'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)008:1433: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i gdan thob par gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1436: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas rab gnas byas
NK041(di)008:1437: pa'i lha rnams thab tu spyan drangs nas mchod cing
NK041(di)008:1438: slar rten gyi thugs kar gshegs la /
NK041(di)008:1439: sbyin sreg grub pa'i me la snod bzang por 'bras
NK041(di)008:1440: ma grug pa mar sbrang ka ra sbyar ba'i 'o
NK041(di)008:1441: ma blug pa gtso sngags kyis bsgrubs pa'i 'o thug
NK041(di)008:1443: lha'i zas su grags pa'i dpal bshos nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
NK041(di)008:1444: zhal zas ro brgya ldan zhing yid 'phrog pa //
NK041(di)008:1445: legs sbyar 'di ni rgyal ba sras bcas la //
NK041(di)008:1446: dad pas phul pas 'gro ba 'di dag kun //
NK041(di)008:1447: 'byor ldan ting 'dzin zas la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)008:1448: ces 'bul ba ni thun mong tsam dang /
NK041(di)008:1449: khyad par tshogs kyi 'khor los kyang dgyes par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1450: bzhi pa rab gnas kyi sngags dang bkra shis kyis mnga' dbul ba las /
NK041(di)008:1452: rten la gzungs thag btags pa'i sne nas slob dpon la sogs pas bzung ste /
NK041(di)008:1453: gnas bya'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du sngags phreng
NK041(di)008:1454: 'khor ba de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras
NK041(di)008:1455: dang bcas pa thams cad rten so so'i rnam pas
NK041(di)008:1456: byon nas de dag la zhugs par bsam zhing sku
NK041(di)008:1457: gzugs la / su pra tish+tha badz+re s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)008:1459: mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang la /
NK041(di)008:1460: h'u h+r+aihb+h+r+au kha badz+r+ai b+ha wa dri d+ha tish+tha b+hu kham /
NK041(di)008:1461: pusti la sngags gnyis ka dang /
NK041(di)008:1465: sngar bsgrubs pa'i gzungs bum gyi chur rten 'brel snying
NK041(di)008:1466: po bzla bzhin du me tog la bran nas 'dus
NK041(di)008:1467: pa thams cad la khyab par bkram ste sngags kyi
NK041(di)008:1468: mnga' 'bul gyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bas me tog
NK041(di)008:1470: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
NK041(di)008:1472: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba sogs bkra shis kyi
NK041(di)008:1473: tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher brjod cing rol mo'i
NK041(di)008:1474: sgra dang bcas pa'i me tog gi sil mas kun
NK041(di)008:1476: bcu gsum pa brtan bzhugs ni /
NK041(di)008:1477: rten rnams sngar rgyun bzhugs kyi stan la ma bkod
NK041(di)008:1478: na skabs 'dir drang zhing brtan par bzhugs su gsol
NK041(di)008:1479: / nyer spyod rol mo dang bcas pas mchod pa'i mtha' rten gyi khri'am /
NK041(di)008:1480: de la me tog gi phreng ba btags pa bzung
NK041(di)008:1481: la rab gnas kyi sngags ci rigs pa bzlas nas
NK041(di)008:1482: slar yang thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
NK041(di)008:1483: ji srid sa chu me dang ni //
NK041(di)008:1484: rlung gi bskal pa 'jig bar du //
NK041(di)008:1485: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
NK041(di)008:1486: bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par mdzod //
NK041(di)008:1487: 'dir ni gzugs dang lhan cig tu //
NK041(di)008:1488: 'khor ba srid du bzhugs nas kyang //
NK041(di)008:1489: nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang //
NK041(di)008:1490: mchog rnams legs par stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)008:1492: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK041(di)008:1493: ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can
NK041(di)008:1494: thams cad mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK041(di)008:1495: sa la ma bzhag gi bar du rgyal ba rnams
NK041(di)008:1496: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar brtan par bzhugs su
NK041(di)008:1497: gsol / khyad par du yang sku gsung thugs kyi
NK041(di)008:1498: rten 'di rnams ji srid 'byung ba bzhi'i gnod pas
NK041(di)008:1499: ma zhig gi bar du brtan par bzhugs su gsol
NK041(di)008:1500: gsol / / brtan par bzhugs nas kyang bdag dang
NK041(di)008:1501: sems can thams cad la mchog dang thun mong gi
NK041(di)008:1502: dngos grub ma lus pa stsal du gsol /
NK041(di)008:1503: zhes lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab /
NK041(di)008:1504: las sngags bzla zhing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag
NK041(di)008:1505: gis sku'i stod smad bar gsum du bskor bas byin
NK041(di)008:1506: gyis brlabs nas shin tu brtan par bsam ste /
NK041(di)008:1507: slar yang me tog la sogs pas mchod cing bstod par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1508: de dag ni dngos gzhi'i cho ga'o //
NK041(di)008:1509: gsum pa rjes kyi sdoms ni /
NK041(di)008:1510: gtor ma srung bsgo mchod bstod gsol //
NK041(di)008:1511: nongs bshags gshegs gsol yon bdag bsgo //
NK041(di)008:1512: shis brjod rten mchod dga' ston yon //
NK041(di)008:1513: bsngo shis rjes bsdu sbyin sreg go //
NK041(di)008:1514: zhes pa'i dang po gtor ma gtong ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1515: 'das gtor sogs chos skyong rnams kyi nang gtor dang /
NK041(di)008:1516: phyogs skyong dang 'byung po spyi la cha gsum gyi cho gas phyi rol du gtong ngo //
NK041(di)008:1517: gnyis pa srung ma bsgo ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1518: gnas gzhi de'i sngar gyi srung ma'am /
NK041(di)008:1519: sgos su gtong bar 'os pa de'i gtor ma zur du bshams pa phul nas /
NK041(di)008:1520: rdo rje srung ba'i rgya bcings te /
NK041(di)008:1523: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
NK041(di)008:1524: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
NK041(di)008:1525: gal te dam las 'das gyur na //
NK041(di)008:1527: badz+ra sa ma ya ha na ha na h+aum phata /
NK041(di)008:1529: chos skyong ba'i srung ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis /
NK041(di)008:1530: deng 'dir rab tu gnas par byas pa'i rten 'di
NK041(di)008:1531: dag phyi ma'i mu mthar thug gi bar srung zhing
NK041(di)008:1532: skyong ba dang mchod pa rgyun mi chad par 'byung
NK041(di)008:1533: bar mdzod cig / bdag dang yon gyi bdag po
NK041(di)008:1534: 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyang 'gal rkyen mi mthun
NK041(di)008:1535: pa'i phyogs las bsrung ba dang /
NK041(di)008:1536: mthun rkyen chos dang mthun pa'i bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phrin las mdzod cig /
NK041(di)008:1538: gang 'dir rab tu gnas byas pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1539: sku gsung thugs kyi rten 'di dag /
NK041(di)008:1540: ji srid gnas pa de srid du //
NK041(di)008:1541: bsrung zhing legs par skyong bar mdzod //
NK041(di)008:1542: ces sogs kyis bka' bsgo zhing gnyer gtad par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1543: gsum pa mchod bstod gsol ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1544: rtsa ba'ii dkyil 'khor la gtang rag gi mchod bstod sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)008:1545: sa dang chu dang me rlung las //
NK041(di)008:1546: lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la //
NK041(di)008:1547: bskal pa brgya ru bsrung ba dang //
NK041(di)008:1548: dgyes shing yid bzang gyur pa yis //
NK041(di)008:1549: slob dpon yon gyi bdag por bcas //
NK041(di)008:1550: kun nas zhi dang rgyas pa dang //
NK041(di)008:1551: rtag tu bkra shis mdzad du gsol //
NK041(di)008:1553: bzhi pa nongs bshags gshegs gsol ni /
NK041(di)008:1554: nyes pa bshags nas mdun bskyed kyi ye shes pa
NK041(di)008:1555: gshegs shing dam tshig pa bsdus nas bdag bskyed thun
NK041(di)008:1556: mtshams su ldang ba'i bar rtsa ba'i cho ga bzhin
NK041(di)008:1557: no // lnga pa yon bdag bsgo ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1558: slob dpon gyi mdun du bkra shis pa'i rdzas rnams snod bzang por bshams /
NK041(di)008:1559: yon bdag gi stan bzang po me tog gi tshom
NK041(di)008:1560: bu can gyi mdun du mchod pa tshar gcig bkod
NK041(di)008:1561: / yon bdag gis slob dpon la phyag byas nas mdun du 'khod pa la /
NK041(di)008:1562: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1563: sku gzugs la sogs khyad par du //
NK041(di)008:1564: ji ltar gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa //
NK041(di)008:1565: de dag don ni nges byas te //
NK041(di)008:1566: de rnams don ni grub zin gyi //
NK041(di)008:1567: ci 'byor pa yis mchod par gyis //
NK041(di)008:1569: khyod kyis nga la gsol ba btab pa bzhin du
NK041(di)008:1570: rab tu gnas pa legs par grub par byas kyis
NK041(di)008:1571: / khyod kyis rten 'di la zhag bdun gyi bar du mchod pa rgya chen po gyis shig /
NK041(di)008:1572: de nas kyang ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa rgyun mi chad par gyis shig /
NK041(di)008:1574: bshams pa'i mchod pa rnams yon bdag gi lag bstar te rten gyi spyan sngar 'bul lo //
NK041(di)008:1575: drug pa bkra shis par bya ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1576: slar yang yon bdag stan la bkod nas me tog gtad /
NK041(di)008:1577: bkra shis la bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bskrad /
NK041(di)008:1578: yon bdag rdzas dang bcas pa las bum gyi chus bsang /
NK041(di)008:1579: stong pa'i ngang las lhar bskyed pa dang /
NK041(di)008:1580: rdzas rnams mam las byung ba'i grub pa'i bkra shis
NK041(di)008:1581: kyi rdzas brgyad sogs rang rang gi byed las phun
NK041(di)008:1582: sum tshogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa'i mthu
NK041(di)008:1583: dang ldan par bsam nas rim gyis thogs /
NK041(di)008:1584: me long ye shes rgya mtsho chen po yis //
NK041(di)008:1585: ye shes rgya mtsho mchog tu dag gyur te //
