NK041(di)008:1586: rnam dag chos la thogs med longs spyod pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1587: bkra shis des kyang sgrib pa dag gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1588: gi wang dug gsum 'joms pa nad kyi sman //
NK041(di)008:1589: sman mchog chos nyid rab tu rtogs gyur nas //
NK041(di)008:1590: nyon mongs zug rngu med par gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)008:1591: bkra shis des kyang sdug bsngal zhi gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1592: zho ni kun gyi snying por gyur pa ste //
NK041(di)008:1593: snying po rnam dag ye shes rnams rtogs te //
NK041(di)008:1594: yon tan kun gyi dbyings su gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)008:1595: bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1596: d+aur+b+aasa tshe ni 'phel bar byed pa ste //
NK041(di)008:1597: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ni rab bsgrubs nas //
NK041(di)008:1598: nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)008:1599: bkra shis des ni tshe yang 'phel gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1600: bilba rgyu rkyen 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos //
NK041(di)008:1601: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod pa kun //
NK041(di)008:1602: byang chub snying po mchog tu gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)008:1603: bkra shis des kyang don kun 'grub gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1604: dung ni chos kyi sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i tshul //
NK041(di)008:1605: ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du dag gyur te //
NK041(di)008:1606: chos rnams ma nor yongs su ston pa yi //
NK041(di)008:1607: bkra shis des kyang tshig dbang thob gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1608: li khri dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin te //
NK041(di)008:1609: chos rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang //
NK041(di)008:1610: chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu brtan gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1611: bkra shis des kyang chos srid brtan gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1612: yungs kar rdo rje'i rigs te thams cad du //
NK041(di)008:1613: bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms par byed pa yis //
NK041(di)008:1614: mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1615: bkra shis des kyang bgegs rnams zhi gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1617: skabs 'ga' zhig tu rgyas pa la mos na /
NK041(di)008:1618: rin chen sna bdun rim gyis bstar la /
NK041(di)008:1619: lha rdzas las byas lte ba shin tu zlum //
NK041(di)008:1620: rtsibs stong ldan cing mu khyud rab mnyam bzang //
NK041(di)008:1621: sdang ba'i dgra las rnam par rgyal gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1622: 'khor lo rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)008:1623: rin chen ngo bo lha rdzas beed+aur+ya //
NK041(di)008:1624: kun tu dpag tshad tsam du snang byed cing //
NK041(di)008:1625: dri med nyin mo ji bzhin mtshan de bzhin //
NK041(di)008:1626: nor bu rin gzugs mdzes lta na sdug cing tshul bzang ma //
NK041(di)008:1627: lpags pa'i mdog legs 'jam zhing dri mchog ldan //
NK041(di)008:1628: yid 'ong 'dod dgu'i reg bya dang ldan pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1629: btsun mo rin gang yang rgyal ba mu tig mdangs ldan pas //
NK041(di)008:1630: gser sogs mang po thub la phul ba ltar //
NK041(di)008:1631: bzod ldan mtshungs pa'i khyim bdag nor ldan te //
NK041(di)008:1632: blon po rin chen yan lag thams cad legs skyes sa la ni //
NK041(di)008:1633: rab gnas gangs can ri 'dra glang po che //
NK041(di)008:1634: rgyal po la 'os mkha' la rab 'gro ba'i //
NK041(di)008:1635: glang po rin chen tho rengs dus su phyogs rnams ma lus pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1636: sa rnams bskor zhing slar yang ldog byed cing //
NK041(di)008:1637: rma bya'i mgrin pa'i spu ltar yid 'ong ba'i //
NK041(di)008:1638: rta mchog rin 'gro dang ldog dang kun nas 'ong gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)008:1639: ma lus bdud dpung 'joms par byed pa la //
NK041(di)008:1640: dpa' brtan 'byor pa'i dpung dang bcas pa yi //
NK041(di)008:1641: dmag dpon rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)008:1642: ces brjod cing rten la 'bul tshul byas nas der
NK041(di)008:1643: 'khod thams cad la reg cing mthar yon bdag la
NK041(di)008:1644: gtad / gzhan yang bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad rgya cher brjod cing me tog gi char dbab bo //
NK041(di)008:1645: bdun pa rten mchod pa ni /
NK041(di)008:1646: rab gnas byas pa'i rten la chu gnyis nyer spyod rol mor bcas pas mchod cing bstod nas /
NK041(di)008:1648: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
NK041(di)008:1649: gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags dang //
NK041(di)008:1650: snying po phyag rgya rig pa'i lha //
NK041(di)008:1652: sku gsung thugs kyi rten 'di dag /
NK041(di)008:1653: ye shes phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas //
NK041(di)008:1655: bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)008:1656: bsod nams bsags pa'i zhing gyur te //
NK041(di)008:1657: zhal dro byin che 'gro ba rnams //
NK041(di)008:1658: skyob pa'i mthu byin ldan pa dang //
NK041(di)008:1659: bdag cag 'di dang gzhan dag tu //
NK041(di)008:1661: myur du sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK041(di)008:1662: ces skabs dang 'brel ba'i smon lam gdab cing rten la bskor ba dang phyag kyang bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1663: brgyad pa dga' ston bya ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1664: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i longs spyod la rol pa dang /
NK041(di)008:1666: bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni //
NK041(di)008:1667: gsol zhig sdig pa byang bar 'gyur //
NK041(di)008:1668: zhes thams cad la khyab par brim pas mtshon /
NK041(di)008:1669: mchod sbyin gyi yul thams cad la bza' btung gi rnyed pa phun sum tshogs pas tshim par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1671: slob dpon bzo bo grogs byed rnams la yon gyi
NK041(di)008:1672: dngos po ci 'byor bas mnyes shing mgu bar bya'o
NK041(di)008:1674: las byas pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir byang chen gyi rgyur bsngo bas rgyas gdab bo //
NK041(di)008:1675: bcu gcig pa slar yang shis par bya ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1676: skabs su babs pa'i shis brjod ci rigs pa brjod pas mtha' rgyas par bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1677: bcu gnyis pa las kyi rjes bsdu ba ni /
NK041(di)008:1678: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon bsdu ba sogs
NK041(di)008:1679: mtha' rgyas rnams cho ga so so'i gzhung ltar bya
NK041(di)008:1680: zhing / dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i yo byad sogs slob
NK041(di)008:1681: dpon dbang bar gsungs pas mtshon ji ltar 'os pa'i
NK041(di)008:1683: bcu gsum pa sbyin sreg ni /
NK041(di)008:1684: zhi rgyas gnyis ka'i sbyin sreg bya zhing ma 'byor na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tsam nges par bya /
NK041(di)008:1685: de yang ma 'byor na yi ge brgya pa ci nus su bzlas pas kha bskang bar bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1686: de dag ni rjes kyi cho ga'o //
NK041(di)008:1687: bshad ma thag pa ni cho ga rgyas pa'i lugs te /
NK041(di)008:1688: phyi dkyil rdul tshon la brten pa'i dbang du byas
NK041(di)008:1689: nas cho ga sta gon dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams
NK041(di)008:1690: sngon du 'gro ba gzhir byas nas /
NK041(di)008:1691: dkyil 'khor dngos gzhi'i sgrub mchod dang rab gnas kyi sta gon nyin gcig tu bya zhing /
NK041(di)008:1692: nyin phyi ma la rab gnas kyi cho ga dkyus
NK041(di)008:1693: su bkod pa bzhin byas pa'i nyin gnyis pa dang
NK041(di)008:1694: / yang rab gnas kyi sta gon sngar bzhin byas nas /
NK041(di)008:1695: gnyis pa la dngos gzhi'i brtan bzhugs yan chad dang /
NK041(di)008:1696: gsum pa la bdag mdun sgrub mchod tsam byas nas /
NK041(di)008:1697: rab gnas zin pa'i rten rnams dngos su gsal bas
NK041(di)008:1698: so so'i snying po dang yig brgya mang du bzlas
NK041(di)008:1699: pas gzi byin bskyed nas mchod bstod rgyas par bya
NK041(di)008:1700: / de rjes gtor ma gtong ba sogs rab gnas kyi rjes chog rnams bya zhing /
NK041(di)008:1701: de ltar na dngos gzhi la rgyas pa dang /
NK041(di)008:1702: rjes la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg kyang bya'o //
NK041(di)008:1703: cho ga rgyas par bya ba de'i tshe dkyil 'khor
NK041(di)008:1704: gyi lha'i gshegs gsol yang yon bdag bsgo ba'ii rjes
NK041(di)008:1706: spyi don gnyis pa 'bring por bya ba'i sdoms ni /
NK041(di)008:1707: nyin gnyis dang por yo byad bsags //
NK041(di)008:1708: bdag bum rten gyi lhag gnas dang //
NK041(di)008:1709: phyi nyin tho rengs bdag bum bzlas //
NK041(di)008:1710: sbyang ba nas bzung rjes bsdu'i bar //
NK041(di)008:1711: rgyas pa'i gzhung bzhin shes par bya //
NK041(di)008:1713: 'di la 'ang phyi dkyil gang 'os la brten na legs so //
NK041(di)008:1714: spyi don gsum pa bsdus pa'i tshul la cung zad bsdus pa dang /
NK041(di)008:1715: shas cher bsdus pa gnyis las /
NK041(di)008:1717: nyin chog dang por yo byad bsham //
NK041(di)008:1718: bdag bskyed bum bzlas lhag gnas dor //
NK041(di)008:1719: dngos gzhi'i sbyang ba nas bzung ste //
NK041(di)008:1720: rjes bsdu'i bar du bya ba yin //
NK041(di)008:1722: bum pa gnyis bkod yo byad bsham //
NK041(di)008:1723: bdag bum rten sbyang bkru phyi bskyed //
NK041(di)008:1724: spyan drangs dgug rgyas dbang mchod bstod //
NK041(di)008:1725: spyan dbye rten bsgyur nyer mkho dbul //
NK041(di)008:1726: rab gnas sngags bzla bkra shis brjod //
NK041(di)008:1727: brtan bzhugs srung bsgo mchod bstod gshegs //
NK041(di)008:1728: yon bdag shis byas smon lam gdab //
NK041(di)008:1729: rjes bsdu dga' ston bya ba yin //
NK041(di)008:1732: bdag bskyed sgom bzlas ci rigs sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)008:1742: shis brjod rnams byas pas kyang dgos pa 'grub bo //
NK041(di)008:1743: spyir rten dam tshig par bskyed pa dang /
NK041(di)008:1746: brtan bzhugs dang bzhi po ni rab gnas dngos yin la /
NK041(di)008:1747: gong 'og gi cho ga gzhan rnams ni yan lag go //
NK041(di)008:1748: des na dkyus su bshad pa'i cho ga nyid la
NK041(di)008:1749: 'dris shing khong du chud par byas nas spro bsdu'i
NK041(di)008:1750: khyad par gang dgos sdoms kyis bstan pa'i don bzhin
NK041(di)008:1751: rtsa ba zin na rgyas bsdus gang 'dod byas chog
NK041(di)008:1752: pa'i phyir / mtha' gcig tu nges pa med mod /
NK041(di)008:1753: 'on kyang lhongs su ma gyur pa'i blo tshod kyis
NK041(di)008:1754: dbye bsdu'i mtshams ma zin na 'chol bar 'gyur bas
NK041(di)008:1755: / ma mtha' yang gnas skabs kyi rdo rje slob
NK041(di)008:1756: dpon chung ngu'i go 'phang tsam thob cing cho ga
NK041(di)008:1757: lag len 'brel sdebs tshul nges pa can du bya
NK041(di)008:1758: dgos te rab gnas ni rdo rje theg pa'i las
NK041(di)008:1759: kyi cho ga gtso che ba zhig yin pa'i phyir
NK041(di)008:1760: / ro // cho ga 'di dang 'brel ba'i cho
NK041(di)008:1761: ga'i yan lag sna tshogs pa'ang yul dus gnas skabs
NK041(di)008:1762: kyis dgos pa rnams ni sngar bshad pa rnams las
NK041(di)008:1763: / ro // shes par bya'o // rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang gsum ye shes kyi //
NK041(di)008:1764: rnam rol 'gro blo'i me long rnyogs bral bar //
NK041(di)008:1765: mos dang bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
NK041(di)008:1766: 'char ba thun mong 'gro la sad byed rten //
NK041(di)008:1767: rnam dag rgyud gzhung grub pa'i man ngag bzhin //
NK041(di)008:1768: 'khrul med cho ga'i sgo 'phar la brten nas //
NK041(di)008:1769: srid zhi'i dge legs ma tshang med pa'i gter //
NK041(di)008:1770: 'dod dgu'i dpal gyi mchog sbyin byed pa byung //
NK041(di)008:1771: gang yang mang po'i tshig gis ma rnyogs shing //
NK041(di)008:1772: brjod don 'bras bu'i dpal gyis yongs lci ba //
NK041(di)008:1773: legs bshad dge legs 'dod pa kun 'jo ba'i //
NK041(di)008:1774: dpag bsam yongs 'du'i byed por 'di gyur cig /
NK041(di)008:1775: rab tu gnas par byed pa'i cho ga dge legs
NK041(di)008:1776: 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba rdo rje theg pa bka'
NK041(di)008:1777: gter gyi rgyud gzhung las bstan pa rnams kyi don
NK041(di)008:1778: snying por bzung / gsang ba spyi la 'jug pa'ii
NK041(di)008:1779: cho ga'i yan lag brjod bde ba dag gis mi
NK041(di)008:1780: 'gal bar brgyan te rig pa 'dzin pa 'gyur med
NK041(di)008:1781: rdo rjes brjod pa'i yi ge pa ni rig byed
